summary: Restructured TruthLemma.lean with improved documentation. The goal of eliminating all sorries was not achievable due to fundamental proof structure interdependence (forward imp case requires backward IH). Kept 2 sorries in temporal backward cases. Completeness.lean remains sorry-free.

artifacts.summary: Simplified backward helpers, added comprehensive documentation of omega-rule limitation
Detailed analysis of proof structure constraints and implementation outcome

completion_data.completion_summary: Restructured TruthLemma.lean to document omega-rule limitation. Removed 2 helper lemmas with sorries, keeping 2 inline sorries in temporal backward cases. The goal of zero sorries was not achievable because forward imp proof requires backward IH. Completeness theorems remain sorry-free.
